item.title: Bias Amplification in Language Model Evolution: An Iterated Learning Perspective
item.description: LLMs’ iterative interactions amplify subtle biases; this paper uses a Bayesian Iterated Learning framework to explain this phenomenon and offers strategies to guide LLM evolution.
